overview:
Barry serves as Chief Executive Officer for Qcue. He is responsible for deciding the overall company strategy and direction. He handles all aspects of the business and partner development activities and also provides guidance for product development.

Prior to founding Qcue, Barry worked in academic services in the University of Texas Athletic Department and co-founded 5RABBIT, a manufacturer of customized bottle openers. Barry has authored papers on a range of economic issues, been quoted in leading publications including The Financial Times and Sports Illustrated, and has appeared on CNN Money, Bloomberg and CNBC.

Barry received his Ph.D. in Economics from the University of Texas at Austin. He holds a M.S. in Economics from the UT and a B.S. (cum laude) in Applied and Engineering Physics from Cornell University.
